mapper.select: SELECT T.cnum AS alumni_circle_members_num, ALC.*, ACT.name AS creator_name FROM ( SELECT ALCM1.alumni_circle_id AS cid, COUNT(ALCM1.account_id) AS cnum FROM alumni_circle_member AS ALCM1 GROUP BY ALCM1.alumni_circle_id ) AS T, alumni_circle AS ALC, account AS ACT WHERE T.cid = ALC.alumni_circle_id AND ACT.account_id = ALC.creator_id AND T.cid IN ( SELECT ALCM2.alumni_circle_id FROM alumni_circle_member AS ALCM2 WHERE ALCM2.account_id = #{accountId} )

SELECT T.cnum AS alumni_circle_members_num, ALC.*, ACT.name AS creator_name FROM ( SELECT ALCM1.alumni_circle_id AS cid, COUNT(ALCM1.account_id) AS cnum FROM alumni_circle_member AS ALCM1 GROUP BY ALCM1.alumni_circle_id ) AS T, alumni_circle AS ALC, account AS ACT WHERE T.cid = ALC.alumni_circle_id AND ACT.account_id = ALC.creator_id AND INSTR(ALC.alumni_circle_name, #{name}) > 0;
